author: MOGOMOTSI MAGOME / AP
title: Africa Coronavirus Cases Over 2,000 as South Africa Rushes Into Lockdown
description: Forty-three of the continent's 54 countries have cases, with the total at 2,046, the Africa Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said.
content:
JOHANNESBURG — Customers started behaving oddly about a week ago, visibly dejected street vendor Frank Mojapelo said. Some were wary to exchange cash. Some backed away, or refused to touch him.
Now, an unprecedented lockdown looms in South Africa over the co… [+4074 chars]
